entry.title: Derby Kids Suede Leather Half Chaps Elastic & Zipper
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Half Chaps
Price: 29.95

Give your young rider the look and feel of tall boots, without the expense! These suede leather half chaps have a tapered leg with an elastic panel for a close, comfortable fit. Elasticized area gives about 1/2" to 3/4" stretch for comfort and fit. A best rated product for over 6 years!

Size X-Small: 11 1/5 " Height at back of the knee, 9" Calf (measure the widest part)
  • Made with suede leather and heavy zippers
  • Elastic stirrups and snaps at ankles
  • Elasticized tapered leg for the perfect fit
  • Elasticized area gives about 1/2" stretch for comfort

entry.title: Derby Originals Adult and Childrens Suede Leather Half Chaps with Full Length Zippers & Elastic for Horseback Riding or Motorcycle Use
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Half Chaps
Price: 24.95 - 34.95 (10 variants)

Derby Originals’ half chaps feature high-quality materials and are carefully constructed to ensure the best fit possible, and produce attractive half chaps that will last for many years to come. Whether you’re looking for a new pair of chaps to wear over your breeches, jodhpurs, or jeans, or are simply looking to make a fashion statement, Derby Originals has a wide assortment of options to suit your needs!

 

Features

QUALITY CONSTRUCTION - these half chaps are made with a high-quality suede material that is soft to the touch and will not fade when washed and features sturdy elastic stirrups, and sturdy snap and buckle closures.

MULTIPLE SIZES - these chaps run smaller than average, so we recommend ordering 1-2 sizes up from your typical half-chap size. These chaps are available in Small, Medium, Large, X-Large, and XX-Large.

ELASTIC STRETCH FIT - these half chaps feature elasticized areas on each leg that allow for between ½” to ¾” of stretchability to the material to ensure the best fit possible.

PROTECTS YOUR PANTS - these half chaps are perfect for protecting your breeches, jodhpurs, or jeans from wear and tear during horseback riding or when riding motorcycles. They also make an attractive fashion statement.

NOT JUST FOR RIDERS - these half chaps are ideal for both English or Western riders, but beyond that, they’re also ideal for motorcyclists, for use in costumes, or as a fashionable accessory to everyday boots.

 

Sizing

entry.title: Derby Originals Synthetic Leather Half Chaps Half Chaps with Elastic for Horseback Riding or Motorcycle Use
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Half Chaps
Price: 19.95

Derby Originals’ half chaps feature high-quality materials and are carefully constructed to ensure the best fit possible, and produce attractive half chaps that will last for many years to come. Whether you’re looking for a new pair of chaps to wear over your breeches, jodhpurs, or jeans, or are simply looking to make a fashion statement, Derby Originals has a wide assortment of options to suit your needs!

 

Product Features

QUALITY CONSTRUCTION - these half chaps are made with a high-quality synthetic leather material that is soft to the touch and will not fade when washed, and features sturdy elastic stirrups, and sturdy velcro closures.

MULTIPLE SIZES - These chaps are available in Small, Large, X-Large, and XX-Large. We recommend ordering a size larger than you typically wear if you plan to wear these over thick or bulky pants.

WATERPROOF CONSTRUCTION - these half chaps are made from an easy to clean and waterproof synthetic leather material that wipes clean with a damp cloth.

PROTECTS YOUR PANTS - these half chaps are perfect for protecting your breeches, jodhpurs, or jeans from wear and tear during horseback riding or when riding motorcycles. They also make an attractive fashion statement.

NOT JUST FOR RIDERS - these half chaps are ideal for both English or Western riders, but beyond that, they’re also ideal for motorcyclists, for use in costumes, or as a fashionable accessory to everyday boots.

entry.title: Paris Tack Canvas & Suede Leather Half Chaps
entry.summary:
Vendor: Paris Tack
Type: Half Chaps
Price: 24.95

Don't let the price fool you! This is a quality product by Paris Tack. Tapered and elasticized leg with zipper for the perfect fit and canvas to keep you cooler. Comfortable and durable, this is a Best Rated product for over 6 years!
  • Suede leather and canvas - cooler than any leather
  • Elastic stirrup, snap at ankle and buckle at calf
  • Tapered leg elasticized with zipper for your perfect fit
